steps.name: TCP ACK scan (firewall rule mapping)
steps.rationale: Map stateful filtering: ACK reveals filtered vs unfiltered without opening connections.
steps.stdout_full:
Starting Nmap 7.95 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-09-01 14:12 +01
Nmap scan report for 192.168.1.113
Host is up (0.0024s latency).

PORT     STATE      SERVICE

53/tcp   unfiltered domain
80/tcp   unfiltered http

443/tcp  unfiltered https
445/tcp  unfiltered microsoft-ds
3389/tcp unfiltered ms-wbt-server
MAC Address: 08:00:27:AB:58:94 (PCS Systemtechnik/Oracle VirtualBox virtual NIC)

Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 0.66 seconds

steps.name: SYN scan baseline
steps.rationale: Establish baseline open/closed ports with stealthy SYN before evasion.

steps.name: Decoy SYN scan
steps.rationale: If baseline hints at monitoring, use decoys to obscure scanner identity while validating reachability.
steps.interpretation: No parsable Nmap port table; possibly filtered or host unreachable

steps.name: SYN scan with spoofed source port 53
steps.rationale: Test firewall trust of DNS by sending from source port 53 to traverse ACLs.
steps.interpretation: No parsable Nmap port table; possibly filtered or host unreachable

steps.name: FIN stealth scan
steps.rationale: FIN probes can slip past stateless filters; closed ports should RST.

steps.name: Packet fragmentation
steps.rationale: Fragment TCP headers to evade stateless ACLs and signature-based IDS.

steps.name: DNS version.bind (CHAOS)
steps.rationale: If DNS responds, reveal BIND version to assess defense stack exposure.
steps.stdout_full:
;; communications error to 192.168.1.113#53: connection refused
;; communications error to 192.168.1.113#53: connection refused
;; communications error to 192.168.1.113#53: connection refused

; <<>> DiG 9.20.9-1-Debian <<>> @192.168.1.113 version.bind CHAOS TXT
; (1 server found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; no servers could be reached
steps.stdout:
;; communications error to 192.168.1.113#53: connection refused
;; communications error to 192.168.1.113#53: connection refused
;; communications error to 192.168.1.113#53: connection refused

; <<>> DiG 9.20.9-1-Debian <<>> @192.168.1.113 version.bind CHAOS TXT
; (1 server found)
;; global options: +cmd
;; no servers could be reached
steps.interpretation: DNS CHAOS query failed (no DNS reachable on target)

steps.name: nc validate from source port 53
steps.rationale: Validate port accessibility using DNS-like source port to confirm Nmap findings.
steps.stderr_full:
Ncat: Version 7.95 ( https://nmap.org/ncat )
Ncat: Connection refused.
steps.stderr:
Ncat: Version 7.95 ( https://nmap.org/ncat )
Ncat: Connection refused.
